snippet: In no other sport does it seem necessary to embellish a perfectly good word like "ball."
abstract: In no other sport does it seem necessary to embellish a perfectly good word like "ball."
lead_paragraph: It's a running joke in our office. One of our editors starts imitating a coach -- "To be a good football team, you have to protect the football, and then make some football plays" -- and others sometimes join in.
